mapper.select:
SELECT su.realname username FROM sys_user su WHERE su.del_flag = 0
AND su.id = #{userId}
select pt.* from patrol_task pt LEFT JOIN patrol_task_user ptu on ptu.task_code = pt.`code` where ptu.user_id = #{id}

select ptu.user_id as userId, count( pt.id ) AS planTaskNumber, count( pt.STATUS = 7 OR NULL ) AS actualFinishTaskNumber from patrol_task_user ptu JOIN patrol_task pt on pt.`code` = ptu.task_code
and ptu.user_id in
#{item}
and DATE_FORMAT(pt.patrol_date,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY ptu.user_id

select pa.user_id as userId, count( DISTINCT(pt.id) ) AS planTaskNumber, count( DISTINCT(pt.STATUS = 7 OR NULL )) AS actualFinishTaskNumber from patrol_task pt JOIN patrol_task_device ptd ON pt.id = ptd.task_id AND ptd.del_flag = 0 JOIN patrol_accompany pa ON ptd.patrol_number = pa.task_device_code
and pa.user_id in
#{item}
and DATE_FORMAT(pt.patrol_date,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY pa.user_id

select ptu.user_id as userId, count(pt.omit_status = 1 OR NULL ) AS missPatrolNumber from patrol_task_user ptu JOIN patrol_task pt on pt.`code` = ptu.task_code
and ptu.user_id in
#{item}
and DATE_FORMAT(pt.patrol_date,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY ptu.user_id

select pa.user_id as userId, count( DISTINCT(pt.omit_status = 1 OR NULL )) AS missPatrolNumber from patrol_task pt JOIN patrol_task_device ptd ON pt.id = ptd.task_id AND ptd.del_flag = 0 JOIN patrol_accompany pa ON ptd.patrol_number = pa.task_device_code
and pa.user_id in
#{item}
and DATE_FORMAT(pt.patrol_date,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY pa.user_id
